abstract: Maurice R. Greenberg, the former chief executive of American International Group, will testify on Wednesday over a sham transaction involving the insurer and a unit of Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, General Re, a judge ruled.
snippet: Maurice R. Greenberg, the former chief executive of American International Group, will testify on Wednesday over a sham transaction involving the insurer and a unit of Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, General Re, a judge ruled.
lead_paragraph: Maurice R. Greenberg, the former chief executive of the American International Group, will testify on Wednesday over a sham transaction involving the insurer and a unit of Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, a judge ruled.

headline.main: Greenberg to Testify on A.I.G.’s Gen Re Deal
